posts.post_title: *SOLD* Assortment of Raw T206's - Gandil, Ganley, WST, Portraits
posts.post_content:
The following raw T206's are for sale. Prices include delivery. PayPal no fees preferred, will also accept check, money order, cash. 

SOLD
Bowerman, Piedmont 150 (tear) - *SOLD*
Hannifan, Piedmont 350 - *SOLD*
Bradley portrait, Piedmont 150 - *SOLD*
Bradley w/ bat, Polar Bear (pin hole) - *SOLD*
Brashear, Piedmont 350 (Crawford STAMP) - *SOLD*
Bell, hands up, Sweet Caporal 350 (marks front/back) - *SOLD*
Jordan, Sweet Caporal 350 (Wet Sheet Transfer) - *SOLD*
Ganley, Piedmont 150 - SOLD
Gandil, Piedmont 350-460 (marks on back) - SOLD
Bell, Sweet Caporal 350-460 OVERSTRIKE (left side trim) - SOLD
Brain, Piedmont 350 - SOLD
Goode, Piedmont 150 - [SOLD
